title: Louis Sullivan Buildings Extant in Chicago
copy: Jewelers' Building, 1881 19 S. Wabash Ave. Louis Sullivan, architect; for Dankmar Adler, Architect.   Left: c.1885-1895 ( view image ); Right: 2006 ( view image ).   Ann Halsted House, 1883 440 W. Belden Ave. Louis Sullivan, architect; for Dankmar Adler and Co.   Left: 1955 ( view image ); Right: 2006 ( view image ).   Ferdinand Kaufmann Store & Building 2310-12 N. Lincoln Ave. Side addition added 1887 Adler & Sullivan, architects   Left: ( view image ); Right: ( view image ).   Morgenthau, Bauland and Co., 1884 108-14 S. State St. Ornament removed, façade renovated 2008   Left: 2006 ( view image ); Right: 2006 ( view image ).
